name: Rainy Cloud
description:
A 2D puzzle game in which a little girl and a magical fox escape the flood. This little girl collects objects to make a boat before coming up water surface.

Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 

Theme: Stronger Together

Platforms: MS Windows

Controllers:
W,A,S,D: Move
Space: Jump
E: Actions (Collect items, Cut the rope, Open the stair handles)
F: Detaching the raincoat from the player
Mouse Drag: Creating a new item
